title: Assateague Island National Seashore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Caution        Virginia District - Swimming Advisory for Seaward Currents  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Virginia District - Swimming Advisory for Seaward Currents  7-1-16 - Caution! We are experiencing a high number of seaward currents in the ocean adjacent to the beach parking lots in the Virginia District. Swim in the lifeguarded area. Wear a lifejacket. Visit the link below for water safety info. more     Information        Maryland District - OSV  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Maryland District - OSV  8-12-16 - The MD OSV zone is open to the Maryland/Virginia state line.          Maryland District - Backcountry Camping Closures  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Maryland District - Backcountry Camping Closures  7-26-16 -  Little Levels, Pine Tree and Tingles Island backcountry campsites are open. State Line, Green Run and Pope Bay backcountry campsites are closed.          Virginia District - OSV  Alert 3 , Severity ,information ,, Virginia District - OSV  7-29-16 - As of July 29: the South OSV zone is open 1.2 miles to U post. The North OSV zone remains open. more                Visitor Centers MD District - The Assateague Island Visitor Center is open daily from 9 am - 5 pm. VA District - The Toms Cove Visitor Center is open daily from 9 am - 5 pm, May through September and from 9 am - 4 pm daily in March, April, October and November. It is open Fridays through Mondays from 9 am - 4 pm in December, January and February. Both visitor centers are closed on Thanksgiving and Christmas days.      Roads and Parking Lots MD District - Open VA District - Open
